div.div: This search form uses an instant search feature. As you type, search results will appear automatically below the search field. When you've entered you desired search terms use tab to navigate through the available results and hit enter to open the selected page or document.

div.p: Marceline R-V Schools is kicking off enrollment for Summer Journey 2020 with on-line registration! Although schools are currently closed due to COVID-19, we are hopeful that we will still be able...

img.alt: HS/MS Letter to Parents and Students

h3.a: HS/MS Letter to Parents and Students

div.p: All Students / Parents need to fill out the form regarding 2nd semester grades. The deadline for filling out this form for Seniors is Tuesday, April 28 and the rest of the MS/HS is Wednesday, April 29. Thanks for your cooperation and support!!

Reminder!! Summer Journey student enrollment is now open! Applications are due this Friday. Please share this post so we can make sure all families are receiving this information. The link below will take you directly to the on-line application: https://www.survey-monkey.com/r/MarcelineSJ view image
Congratulations to our 2020-2021 Student Council Officers at Walt Disney Elementary: President - Katey Kussman, Vice-President - Nolan Green, Secretary - Zane Svendsen, Treasurer - Trace Terrell.
With the Governor shut down extending to the end of the school year the original graduation date has been moved to a date to be determined toward the end of July.
